Control.desc: reg_nr4_drt_chsad_mode : // unsigned , default = 1 mode for chroma horiztonal sad calc., 0: no vertical lpf, 1: vertical [1 2 1], 2 or 3: vertical [ 1 2 2 2 1] if 5 lines

Control.name: reg_nr4_drt_ydsad_hlpf
Control.desc: reg_nr4_drt_ydsad_hlpf : // unsigned , default = 1 hlpf for luma dsad of drt calculation, 0: no lpf, 1: with [1 2 1] hlpf

Control.name: reg_nr4_drt_cdsad_hlpf
Control.desc: reg_nr4_drt_cdsad_hlpf : // unsigned , default = 1 hlpf for chroma dsad of drt calculation, 0: no lpf, 1: with [1 2 1] hlpf

Control.name: reg_nr4_ydrt_dif_mode
Control.desc: reg_nr4_ydrt_dif_mode : // unsigned , default = 1 0:y_dif, 1: y_dif + (u_dif + v_dif)/2

Control.desc: reg_nr4_cdrt_dif_mode : // unsigned , default = 2 0:(u_dif + v_dif), 1: y_dif/4 + (u_dif + v_dif)*3/4, 2:y_dif/2 + (u_dif + v_dif)/2, 3: y_dif (not recommended)

Control.desc: reg_nr4_ysad_hrz_gain : // unsigned , default = 16 gain for horizontal sad, 16 normalized to 1

Control.desc: reg_nr4_ydrt_alp_core_rate : // unsigned , default = 0 luma ratio to min_err, alpha = (min_err - (max_err - min_err)*rate + ofst)/max_err * 64; dft = 0/32

Control.name: reg_nr4_cdrt_alp_core_rate
Control.desc: reg_nr4_cdrt_alp_core_rate : // unsigned , default = 0 chroma ratio to min_err, alpha = (min_err - (max_err - min_err)*rate + ofst)/max_err * 64; dft = 0/32

Control.name: reg_nr4_ydrt_alp_core_ofst
Control.desc: reg_nr4_ydrt_alp_core_ofst : // unsigned , default = 10 luma offset to min_err, alpha = (min_err - (max_err - min_err)*rate + ofst)/max_err * 64; dft = 10

Control.name: reg_nr4_cdrt_alp_core_ofst
Control.desc: reg_nr4_cdrt_alp_core_ofst : // unsigned , default = 10 chroma offset to min_err, alpha = (min_err - (max_err - min_err)*rate + ofst)/max_err * 64; dft = 10

Control.desc: reg_nr4_ydrt_alp_min : // unsigned , default = 0 luma min value of alpha, dft = 0

Control.desc: reg_nr4_ydrt_alp_max : // unsigned , default = 63 luma max value of alpha, dft = 63

Control.desc: reg_nr4_cdrt_alp_min : // unsigned , default = 0 chroma min value of alpha, dft = 0

Control.desc: reg_nr4_bet2_sel : // unsigned , default = 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_sel_mode
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_sel_mode : // unsigned , default = 0 0: no filter, 1: adpgau, adp_drt_lpf blend; 2: adpgau, drt4_lpf blend; 3: adp_drt_lpf method, 4: drt4_lpf method, 5: adp_drt_original image blend, 6: drt4_lpf, original image blend, 7: adpgau method; dft=1

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_gaulpf_mode
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_gaulpf_mode : // unsigned , default = 1 0: 3*5 or 5*5 gaussian lpf; 1: 3*3 (window size) gaussian lpf; dft=1

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alpha0_sad_mode
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alpha0_sad_mode : // unsigned , default = 3 0: max_sad*max_ssd; 1: max_sad*max_sad; 2: adp_max_sad*max_ssd; 3: adp_max_sad*adp_max_sad dft=3

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alpha1_sad_mode
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alpha1_sad_mode : // unsigned , default = 2 0: max_sad; 1: cross_max_sad; 2 or 3: adp_sad dft=2

Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_adp_drtlpf_mode : // unsigned , default = 3 0: adp_drtlpf [2 1 1]/4, 1: adp_drtlpf [4 2 1 1]/8; 2: adp_drtlpf [2 2 2 1 1]/8; 3: adp_drtlpf [7 7 7 6 5]/32; dft=3;

Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_ymin : // unsigned , default = 127 normalized to 128 as 1

Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_ymax : // unsigned , default = 127 normalized to 128 as 1

Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_cmin : // unsigned , default = 127 normalized to 128 as 1

Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar0 : // unsigned , default = 0 threshold0 of curve to map mierr to alp0 for chroma channel, this will be set value of flat region mierr that no need blur.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar1
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar1 : // unsigned , default = 25 threshold1 of curve to map mierr to alp0 for chroma channel,this will be set value of texture region mierr that can not blur.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar5
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar5 : // unsigned , default = 40 rate0 (for mierr less than th0) of curve to map mierr to alp0 for chroma channel. the larger of the value, the deep of the slope. 0~255.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar6
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar6 : // unsigned , default = 40 rate1 (for mierr>th1) of curve to map mierr to alp0 for chroma channel. the larger of the value, the deep of the slope. 0~255.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar2
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar2 : // unsigned , default = 127 level limit(for mierr less than th0) of curve to map mierr to alp0 for chroma channel, that we can do for flat region. 0~255.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar3
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar3 : // unsigned , default = 0 level limit(for th0 less than mierr less than th1) of curve to map mierr to alp0 for chroma channel, that we can do for misc region. 0~255.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar4
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar4 : // unsigned , default = 127 level limit(for mierr>th1) of curve to map mierr to alp0 for chroma channel, that we can do for texture region. 0~255.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar0
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar0 : // unsigned , default = 0 threshold0 of curve to map mierr to alp0 for luma channel, this will be set value of flat region mierr that no need blur. 0~255.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar1
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar1 : // unsigned , default = 25 threshold1 of curve to map mierr to alp0 for luma channel,this will be set value of texture region mierr that can not blur.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar5
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar5 : // unsigned , default = 40 rate0 (for mierr less than th0) of curve to map mierr to alp0 for luma channel. the larger of the value, the deep of the slope. 0~255.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar6
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar6 : // unsigned , default = 40 rate1 (for mierr>th1) of curve to map mierr to alp0 for luma channel. the larger of the value, the deep of the slope. 0~255.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar2
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar2 : // unsigned , default = 127 level limit(for mierr less than th0) of curve to map mierr to alp0 for luma channel, set to alp0 that we can do for flat region. 0~255.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar3
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar3 : // unsigned , default = 0 level limit(for th0 less than mierr less than th1) of curve to map mierr to alp0 for luma channel, alp0 that we can do for misc region. 0~255.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar4
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar4 : // unsigned , default = 127 level limit(for mierr>th1) of curve to map mierr to alp0 for luma channel, alp0 that we can do for texture region. 0~255.

Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp1_minerr_cpar6 : // unsigned , default = 20 a/chroma channel. the larger of the value, the deep of the slope. 0~255

Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp1_minerr_cpar2 : // unsigned , default = 0 will be set to alp1 that we can do for flat region. 0~255.

Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp1_minerr_cpar4 : // unsigned , default = 63 will be set to alp1 that we can do for texture region. 0~255.255 before

Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp1_minerr_ypar0 : // unsigned , default = 0 thra/chroma channel, this will be set value of flat region mierr that no need directional NR. 0~255.

Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp1_minerr_ypar5 : // unsigned , default = 0 ratlp1 for luma/chroma channel. the larger of the value, the deep of the slope.

Control.name: pre_gclk_ctrlnoclkgatecontrol
Control.desc: pre_gclk_ctrl no clk gate control. if ==1, module clk is not gated (always on).[4] for me, [3] for pulldown,[2] for mtn_1,[0] for nr,[1] for clk_me enable, [7] for clk_div enable

Control.name: post_gclk_ctrlnoclkgatecontrol
Control.desc: post_gclk_ctrl no clk gate control. [4] for ei_1, [3] for ei_0,[2] for ei_top, [1] for blend_1, [0] for blend_0, [5] for clk_post_div enable,

Control.name: di_gate_allclkshutdown
Control.desc: di_gate_all clk shut down. if ==1 , all di clock shut down

Control.name: di_no_clk_gatenoclkgatecontrol
Control.desc: di_no_clk_gate no clk gate control. if di_gated_all==0 and di_no_clk_gate ==1, all di clock is always working.

Control.name: reg_nr4_mcnr_en
Control.desc: reg_nr4_mcnr_en : // unsigned , default = 1 ncnr enable or bypass, dft = 1

Control.name: reg_nr2_en
Control.desc: reg_nr2_en : // unsigned , default = 1 nr2 enable, dft = 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_en
Control.desc: reg_nr4_en : // unsigned , default = 1 nr4 enable, dft = 1

Control.name: reg_nr2_proc_en
Control.desc: reg_nr2_proc_en : // unsigned , default = 1

Control.name: reg_det3d_en
Control.desc: reg_det3d_en : // unsigned , default = 1

Control.name: di_polar_en
Control.desc: di_polar_en : // unsigned , default = 1 do does not have in C

Control.name: reg_nr4_lnbuf_ctrl
Control.desc: reg_nr4_lnbuf_ctrl : // unsigned , default = 1 line buf ctrl for nr4: 0, 3lines, 1, 5lines, dft = 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_en
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_en : // unsigned , default = 0 snr2 enable, 0: use old snr, 1: use new snr2, dft = 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_scene_change_en
Control.desc: reg_nr4_scene_change_en : // unsigned , default = 1 enable scene change proc. dft = 1

Control.name: nr2_sw_en
Control.desc: nr2_sw_en : // unsigned , default = 1 do does not have in C

Control.name: reg_nr4_scene_change_flg
Control.desc: reg_nr4_scene_change_flg : // unsigned , default = 0 flags for scene change, dft = 0

Control.name: reg_nr4_ydrt_3line_ssd_gain
Control.desc: reg_nr4_ydrt_3line_ssd_gain : // unsigned , default = 16 gain to max ssd normalized 16 as 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_ydrt_5line_ssd_gain
Control.desc: reg_nr4_ydrt_5line_ssd_gain : // unsigned , default = 16 gain to max ssd normalized 16 as 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_drt_yhsad_mode
Control.desc: reg_nr4_drt_yhsad_mode : // unsigned , default = 1 mode for luma horiztonal sad calc., 0: no vertical lpf, 1: vertical [1 2 1], 2 or 3: vertical [ 1 2 2 2 1] if 5 lines

Control.name: reg_nr4_drt_chsad_mode
Control.desc: reg_nr4_drt_chsad_mode : // unsigned , default = 1 mode for chroma horiztonal sad calc., 0: no vertical lpf, 1: vertical [1 2 1], 2 or 3: vertical [ 1 2 2 2 1] if 5 lines

Control.name: reg_nr4_drt_yhsad_hlpf
Control.desc: reg_nr4_drt_yhsad_hlpf : // unsigned , default = 1 hlpf for luma hsad of drt calculation, 0: no lpf, 1: with [1 2 1] hlpf

Control.name: reg_nr4_drt_yvsad_hlpf
Control.desc: reg_nr4_drt_yvsad_hlpf : // unsigned , default = 1 hlpf for luma vsad of drt calculation, 0: no lpf, 1: with [1 2 1] hlpf

Control.name: reg_nr4_drt_ydsad_hlpf
Control.desc: reg_nr4_drt_ydsad_hlpf : // unsigned , default = 1 hlpf for luma dsad of drt calculation, 0: no lpf, 1: with [1 2 1] hlpf

Control.name: reg_nr4_drt_chsad_hlpf
Control.desc: reg_nr4_drt_chsad_hlpf : // unsigned , default = 1 hlpf for chrome hsad of drt calculation, 0: no lpf, 1: with [1 2 1] hlpf

Control.name: reg_nr4_drt_cvsad_hlpf
Control.desc: reg_nr4_drt_cvsad_hlpf : // unsigned , default = 1 hlpf for chroma vsad of drt calculation, 0: no lpf, 1: with [1 2 1] hlpf

Control.name: reg_nr4_drt_cdsad_hlpf
Control.desc: reg_nr4_drt_cdsad_hlpf : // unsigned , default = 1 hlpf for chroma dsad of drt calculation, 0: no lpf, 1: with [1 2 1] hlpf

Control.name: reg_nr4_ydrt_dif_mode
Control.desc: reg_nr4_ydrt_dif_mode : // unsigned , default = 1 0:y_dif, 1: y_dif + (u_dif + v_dif)/2

Control.name: reg_nr4_cdrt_dif_mode
Control.desc: reg_nr4_cdrt_dif_mode : // unsigned , default = 2 0:(u_dif + v_dif), 1: y_dif/4 + (u_dif + v_dif)*3/4, 2:y_dif/2 + (u_dif + v_dif)/2, 3: y_dif (not recommended)

Control.name: reg_nr4_ysad_hrz_gain
Control.desc: reg_nr4_ysad_hrz_gain : // unsigned , default = 16 gain for horizontal sad, 16 normalized to 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_ysad_diag_gain
Control.desc: reg_nr4_ysad_diag_gain : // unsigned , default = 20 gain for diagonal sad, 16 normalized to 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_ysad_vrt_gain
Control.desc: reg_nr4_ysad_vrt_gain : // unsigned , default = 16 gain for vertical sad, 16 normalized to 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_drt_ysad_core_rate
Control.desc: reg_nr4_drt_ysad_core_rate : // unsigned , default = 6 rate of coring for sad(theta) - sad(theta+pi/2)*rate/64

Control.name: reg_nr4_csad_hrz_gain
Control.desc: reg_nr4_csad_hrz_gain : // unsigned , default = 16 gain for horizontal sad, 16 normalized to 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_csad_diag_gain
Control.desc: reg_nr4_csad_diag_gain : // unsigned , default = 20 gain for diagonal sad, 16 normalized to 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_csad_vrt_gain
Control.desc: reg_nr4_csad_vrt_gain : // unsigned , default = 16 gain for vertical sad, 16 normalized to 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_drt_csad_core_rate
Control.desc: reg_nr4_drt_csad_core_rate : // unsigned , default = 6 rate of coring for sad(theta) - sad(theta+pi/2)*rate/64

Control.name: reg_nr4_ydrt_alp_core_rate
Control.desc: reg_nr4_ydrt_alp_core_rate : // unsigned , default = 0 luma ratio to min_err, alpha = (min_err - (max_err - min_err)*rate + ofst)/max_err * 64; dft = 0/32

Control.name: reg_nr4_cdrt_alp_core_rate
Control.desc: reg_nr4_cdrt_alp_core_rate : // unsigned , default = 0 chroma ratio to min_err, alpha = (min_err - (max_err - min_err)*rate + ofst)/max_err * 64; dft = 0/32

Control.name: reg_nr4_ydrt_alp_core_ofst
Control.desc: reg_nr4_ydrt_alp_core_ofst : // unsigned , default = 10 luma offset to min_err, alpha = (min_err - (max_err - min_err)*rate + ofst)/max_err * 64; dft = 10

Control.name: reg_nr4_cdrt_alp_core_ofst
Control.desc: reg_nr4_cdrt_alp_core_ofst : // unsigned , default = 10 chroma offset to min_err, alpha = (min_err - (max_err - min_err)*rate + ofst)/max_err * 64; dft = 10

Control.name: reg_nr4_ydrt_alp_min
Control.desc: reg_nr4_ydrt_alp_min : // unsigned , default = 0 luma min value of alpha, dft = 0

Control.name: reg_nr4_ydrt_alp_max
Control.desc: reg_nr4_ydrt_alp_max : // unsigned , default = 63 luma max value of alpha, dft = 63

Control.name: reg_nr4_cdrt_alp_min
Control.desc: reg_nr4_cdrt_alp_min : // unsigned , default = 0 chroma min value of alpha, dft = 0

Control.name: reg_nr4_cdrt_alp_max
Control.desc: reg_nr4_cdrt_alp_max : // unsigned , default = 63 chroma max value of alpha, dft = 63

Control.name: reg_nr4_bet2_sel
Control.desc: reg_nr4_bet2_sel : // unsigned , default = 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_sel_mode
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_sel_mode : // unsigned , default = 0 0: no filter, 1: adpgau, adp_drt_lpf blend; 2: adpgau, drt4_lpf blend; 3: adp_drt_lpf method, 4: drt4_lpf method, 5: adp_drt_original image blend, 6: drt4_lpf, original image blend, 7: adpgau method; dft=1

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_gaulpf_mode
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_gaulpf_mode : // unsigned , default = 1 0: 3*5 or 5*5 gaussian lpf; 1: 3*3 (window size) gaussian lpf; dft=1

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alpha0_sad_mode
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alpha0_sad_mode : // unsigned , default = 3 0: max_sad*max_ssd; 1: max_sad*max_sad; 2: adp_max_sad*max_ssd; 3: adp_max_sad*adp_max_sad dft=3

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alpha1_sad_mode
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alpha1_sad_mode : // unsigned , default = 2 0: max_sad; 1: cross_max_sad; 2 or 3: adp_sad dft=2

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_adp_drtlpf_mode
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_adp_drtlpf_mode : // unsigned , default = 3 0: adp_drtlpf [2 1 1]/4, 1: adp_drtlpf [4 2 1 1]/8; 2: adp_drtlpf [2 2 2 1 1]/8; 3: adp_drtlpf [7 7 7 6 5]/32; dft=3;

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_ymin
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_ymin : // unsigned , default = 127 normalized to 128 as 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_ymax
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_ymax : // unsigned , default = 127 normalized to 128 as 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_cmin
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_cmin : // unsigned , default = 127 normalized to 128 as 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_cmax
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_cmax : // unsigned , default = 127 normalized to 128 as 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar0
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar0 : // unsigned , default = 0 threshold0 of curve to map mierr to alp0 for chroma channel, this will be set value of flat region mierr that no need blur.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar1
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar1 : // unsigned , default = 25 threshold1 of curve to map mierr to alp0 for chroma channel,this will be set value of texture region mierr that can not blur.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar5
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar5 : // unsigned , default = 40 rate0 (for mierr less than th0) of curve to map mierr to alp0 for chroma channel. the larger of the value, the deep of the slope. 0~255.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar6
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar6 : // unsigned , default = 40 rate1 (for mierr>th1) of curve to map mierr to alp0 for chroma channel. the larger of the value, the deep of the slope. 0~255.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar2
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar2 : // unsigned , default = 127 level limit(for mierr less than th0) of curve to map mierr to alp0 for chroma channel, that we can do for flat region. 0~255.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar3
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar3 : // unsigned , default = 0 level limit(for th0 less than mierr less than th1) of curve to map mierr to alp0 for chroma channel, that we can do for misc region. 0~255.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar4
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar4 : // unsigned , default = 127 level limit(for mierr>th1) of curve to map mierr to alp0 for chroma channel, that we can do for texture region. 0~255.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar0
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar0 : // unsigned , default = 0 threshold0 of curve to map mierr to alp0 for luma channel, this will be set value of flat region mierr that no need blur. 0~255.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar1
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar1 : // unsigned , default = 25 threshold1 of curve to map mierr to alp0 for luma channel,this will be set value of texture region mierr that can not blur.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar5
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar5 : // unsigned , default = 40 rate0 (for mierr less than th0) of curve to map mierr to alp0 for luma channel. the larger of the value, the deep of the slope. 0~255.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar6
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar6 : // unsigned , default = 40 rate1 (for mierr>th1) of curve to map mierr to alp0 for luma channel. the larger of the value, the deep of the slope. 0~255.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar2
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar2 : // unsigned , default = 127 level limit(for mierr less than th0) of curve to map mierr to alp0 for luma channel, set to alp0 that we can do for flat region. 0~255.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar3

Control.name: reg_nrdeband_reset0
Control.desc: reg_nrdeband_reset0 : // unsigned , default = 0 0 : no reset seed 1: reload luma seed

Control.name: reg_nrdeband_rgb
Control.desc: reg_nrdeband_rgb : // unsigned , default = 0 0 : yuv 1: RGB

Control.name: reg_nrdeband_en11
Control.desc: reg_nrdeband_en11 : // unsigned , default = 1 debanding registers of side lines, [0] for luma, same for below

Control.name: reg_nrdeband_en10
Control.desc: reg_nrdeband_en10 : // unsigned , default = 1 debanding registers of side lines, [1] for chroma, same for below

Control.name: reg_nrdeband_siderand
Control.desc: reg_nrdeband_siderand : // unsigned , default = 1 options to use side two lines use the rand, instead of use for the YUV three component of middle line, 0: seed[3]/bandrand[3] for middle line yuv; 1: seed[3]/bandrand[3] for nearby three lines Y;

Control.name: reg_nrdeband_randmode
Control.desc: reg_nrdeband_randmode : // unsigned , default = 0 mode of rand noise adding, 0: same noise strength for all difs; else: strenght of noise will not exceed the difs, MIN((pPKReg->reg_nrdeband_bandrand[m]), noise[m])

Control.desc: reg_nrdeband_bandrand2 : // unsigned , default = 6

Control.desc: reg_nrdeband_bandrand1 : // unsigned , default = 6

Control.name: reg_nrdeband_bandrand0
Control.desc: reg_nrdeband_bandrand0 : // unsigned , default = 6

Control.name: reg_nrdeband_hpxor1
Control.desc: reg_nrdeband_hpxor1 : // unsigned , default = 1 debanding random hp portion xor, [0] for luma

Control.name: reg_nrdeband_hpxor0
Control.desc: reg_nrdeband_hpxor0 : // unsigned , default = 1 debanding random hp portion xor, [1] for chroma

Control.desc: reg_nrdeband_en1 : // unsigned , default = 1 debanding registers, for luma

Control.name: reg_nrdeband_en0
Control.desc: reg_nrdeband_en0 : // unsigned , default = 1 debanding registers, for chroma

Control.name: reg_nrdeband_lpf_mode1

Control.name: reg_nrdeband_lpf_mode0
Control.desc: reg_nrdeband_lpf_mode0 : // unsigned , default = 2 lpf mode, 0: 3x3, 1:3x5; 2: 5x5; 3:5x7

Control.name: reg_nrdeband_luma_th3
Control.desc: reg_nrdeband_luma_th3 : // unsigned , default = 9 threshold to |Y-Ylpf|, if less than th[0] use lpf

Control.name: reg_nrdeband_luma_th2
Control.desc: reg_nrdeband_luma_th2 : // unsigned , default = 7 elseif less than th[1] use (lpf*3 + y)/4

Control.name: reg_nrdeband_luma_th1
Control.desc: reg_nrdeband_luma_th1 : // unsigned , default = 6 elseif less than th[1] use (lpf*3 + y)/4elseif less than th[2] (lpf*1 + y)/2

Control.name: reg_nrdeband_luma_th0
Control.desc: reg_nrdeband_luma_th0 : // unsigned , default = 5 elseif less than th[1] use (lpf*3 + y)/4elseif elseif less than th[3] (lpf*1 + 3*y)/4; else

Control.name: reg_nrdeband_chrm_th3
Control.desc: reg_nrdeband_chrm_th3 : // unsigned , default = 9 threshold to |Y-Ylpf|, if less than th[0] use lpf

Control.name: reg_nrdeband_chrm_th2
Control.desc: reg_nrdeband_chrm_th2 : // unsigned , default = 7 elseif less than th[1] use (lpf*3 + y)/4

Control.name: reg_nrdeband_chrm_th1
Control.desc: reg_nrdeband_chrm_th1 : // unsigned , default = 6 elseif less than th[1] use (lpf*3 + y)/4elseif less than th[2] (lpf*1 + y)/2

Control.name: reg_nrdeband_chrm_th0
Control.desc: reg_nrdeband_chrm_th0 : // unsigned , default = 5 elseif less than th[1] use (lpf*3 + y)/4elseif elseif

Control.name: reg_NM_reset
Control.desc: reg_NM_reset : Reset to the status of the Loop filter.

Control.desc: reg_NM_calc_length : Length mode of the Noise measurement sample number for statistics. 0:256 samples;1: 512 samples;2: 1024 samples;X: 2^(8+x) samples

Control.desc: reg_NM_dec_step : Loop filter input gain decrease step.

Control.name: reg_NM_YHPmot_thrd_max
Control.desc: reg_NM_YHPmot_thrd_max : Maximum threshold for Luma channel HP portion motion to decide whether the pixel will be included in Luma noise measurement.

Control.desc: reg_NM_Ylock_rate : Rate to decide whether the Luma noise measurement is lock or not.

Control.desc: reg_NM_CHPmot_thrd_min : Minimum threshold for Chroma channel HP portion motion to decide whether the pixel will be included in Chroma noise measurement.

Control.name: reg_NM_CHPmot_thrd_max
Control.desc: reg_NM_CHPmot_thrd_max : Maximum threshold for Chroma channel HP portion motion to decide whether the pixel will be included in Chroma noise measurement.

Control.name: reg_NM_Clock_rate

Control.desc: ro_NM_TNR_Ylock : Read-only register to tell ifLuma channel noise measurement is locked or not.

Control.name: ro_NM_TNR_Clock
Control.desc: ro_NM_TNR_Clock : Read-only register to tell if Chroma channel noise measurement is locked or not.

Control.name: ro_NM_TNR_Ylevel
Control.desc: ro_NM_TNR_Ylevel : Read-only register to give Luma channel noise level. It was 16x of pixel difference in 8 bits of YHPmot.

Control.name: ro_NM_TNR_Clevel
Control.desc: ro_NM_TNR_Clevel : Read-only register to give Chroma channel noise level. It was 16x of pixel difference in 8 bits of CHPmot.

Control.desc: ro_NMFrm_TNR_Clevel : Frame based Read-only register to give Chroma channel noise level within one frame/field.

Control.name: ro_NMFrm_TNR_Ccount
Control.desc: ro_NMFrm_TNR_Ccount : Number of Chroma channel pixels included in Frame/Field based noise level measurement.

Control.name: ro_NMFrm_TNR_Ylevel
Control.desc: ro_NMFrm_TNR_Ylevel : Frame based Read-only register to give Luma channel noise level within one frame/field.

Control.name: ro_NMFrm_TNR_Ycount
Control.desc: ro_NMFrm_TNR_Ycount : Number ofLuma channel pixels included in Frame/Field based noise level measurement.

Control.name: pre_gclk_ctrlnoclkgatecontrol
Control.desc: pre_gclk_ctrl no clk gate control. if ==1, module clk is not gated (always on).[4] for me, [3] for pulldown,[2] for mtn_1,[0] for nr,[1] for clk_me enable, [7] for clk_div enable

Control.name: post_gclk_ctrlnoclkgatecontrol
Control.desc: post_gclk_ctrl no clk gate control. [4] for ei_1, [3] for ei_0,[2] for ei_top, [1] for blend_1, [0] for blend_0, [5] for clk_post_div enable,

Control.name: di_gate_allclkshutdown
Control.desc: di_gate_all clk shut down. if ==1 , all di clock shut down

Control.name: di_no_clk_gatenoclkgatecontrol
Control.desc: di_no_clk_gate no clk gate control. if di_gated_all==0 and di_no_clk_gate ==1, all di clock is always working.

Control.name: reg_MATNR_beta_BRT_limt_hi
Control.desc: reg_MATNR_beta_BRT_limt_hi : U4, Beta adjustment based on Brightness high side Limit. (X16 to u8 scale)

Control.name: reg_MATNR_beta_BRT_slop_hi
Control.desc: reg_MATNR_beta_BRT_slop_hi : U4, Beta adjustment based on Brightness high side slope. Normalized to 16 as 1

Control.name: reg_MATNR_beta_BRT_thrd_hi
Control.desc: reg_MATNR_beta_BRT_thrd_hi : U8, Beta adjustment based on Brightness high threshold.(u8 scale)

Control.name: reg_MATNR_beta_BRT_limt_lo
Control.desc: reg_MATNR_beta_BRT_limt_lo : U4, Beta adjustment based on Brightness low side Limit. (X16 to u8 scale)

Control.name: reg_MATNR_beta_BRT_slop_lo
Control.desc: reg_MATNR_beta_BRT_slop_lo : U4, Beta adjustment based on Brightness low side slope. Normalized to 16 as 1

Control.name: reg_MATNR_beta_BRT_thrd_lo
Control.desc: reg_MATNR_beta_BRT_thrd_lo : U8, Beta adjustment based on Brightness low threshold.(u8 scale)

Control.name: reg_CUE_PRG_Enable
Control.desc: reg_CUE_PRG_Enable : Enable bit for progressive video CUE detection.If interlace input video,

Control.name: reg_CUE_PRG_rate
Control.desc: reg_CUE_PRG_rate : U3, The Krate to decide CUE by relationship between CUE_difCur and (CUE_difEC+CUE_difEG)

Control.name: reg_CUE_PRG_difCEG_thrd
Control.desc: reg_CUE_PRG_difCEG_thrd : U8, Current Frame Intra-Field up-mid and mid-down line chroma difference threshold for progressive video CUE detection,

Control.name: reg_CUE_PRG_difCur_thrd
Control.desc: reg_CUE_PRG_difCur_thrd : U8, Current Frame Intra-Field up/down line chroma difference threshold,

Control.name: Cfr_enable
Control.desc: Cfr_enable :

Control.name: reg_CFR_CurDif_luma_mode
Control.desc: reg_CFR_CurDif_luma_mode : Current Field Top/Bot line Luma difference calculation mode

Control.name: reg_MACFR_frm_phase
Control.desc: reg_MACFR_frm_phase : U2 This will be a field based phase register that need to be set by FW phase to phase: this will be calculated based on dbdr_phase of the specific line of this frame. u1 : dbdr_phase=1, center line is DB in current line; dbdr_phase=2, center line is Dr in current line;

Control.name: reg_CFR_CurDif_tran_mode
Control.desc: reg_CFR_CurDif_tran_mode : U2 Current Field Top/Bot line Luma/Chroma transition level calculation mode,

Control.name: reg_CFR_alpha_mode
Control.desc: reg_CFR_alpha_mode : U2 Alpha selection mode for CFR block from curAlp and motAlp i.e. 0: motAlp; 1: (motAlp+curAlp)/2; 2: min(motAlp,curAlp); 3: max(motAlp,curAlp);

Control.name: reg_CFR_Motion_Luma_mode
Control.desc: reg_CFR_Motion_Luma_mode : U2 LumaMotion Calculation mode for MA-CFR. 0: top/bot Lumma motion; 1: middle Luma Motion 2: top/bot + middle motion; 3: max(top/tot motion, middle motion)

Control.name: reg_CFR_alpha_gain
Control.desc: reg_CFR_alpha_gain : gain to map muxed curAlp and motAlp to alpha that will be used for final blending.

Control.name: reg_CFR_Motion_ofst
Control.desc: reg_CFR_Motion_ofst : Offset to Motion to calculate the motAlp, e,g:motAlp= reg_CFR_Motion_ofst- Motion;This register can be seen as the level of motion that we consider it at moving.

Control.name: reg_CFR_CurDif_gain
Control.desc: reg_CFR_CurDif_gain : gain to CurDif to map to alpha, normalized to 32;

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_suremot_txt_mode
Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_suremot_txt_mode : ; // u3: 0: cur, 1:p2; 2: (cur+p2)/2; 3/up: min(cur,p2)

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_coop_mode
Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_coop_mode : ; // u2 0 original pixel 1: [1 2 1]/4 lpf; 2: [1 2 2 2 1]/8; 3: 3x3 lpf

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_coop_ratio
Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_coop_ratio : ; // u4 cur and p2 color oop decision ratio: (avg1 less than (MAX(sat0,sat2)*ratio/8 + ofst));

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_coop_ofset
Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_coop_ofset : ; // s8 cur and p2 color oop decision ofst: (avg1 less than (MAX(sat0,sat2)*ratio/8 + ofst));

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_coop_sat_thrd
Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_coop_sat_thrd : ; // u8 cur and p2 color oop decision min(sat0,sat1) threshold;

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_cnoop_ratio0
Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_cnoop_ratio0 : ; // u4 cur and p2 color noop decision ratio0: (avg1 less than (MAX(sat0,sat2)*ratio0/8 + ofst0));

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_cnoop_ratio1
Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_cnoop_ratio1 : ; // u4

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_cnoop_ofset0
Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_cnoop_ofset0 : ; // s8

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_cnoop_ofset1
Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_cnoop_ofset1 : ; // s8 cur and p2 color noop decision ofset1: (dif1 less than (MIN(sat0,sat2)*ratio1/8 + ofst1));

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_ymot_only_en
Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_ymot_only_en : ; // u1: enable signal for ignor chroma motion: (ytxt @coop)

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_ymot_only_cmtmode
Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_ymot_only_cmtmode : ; // u1: 0: cmot=ymot; 1: cmot = MIN(ymot, cmot)

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_ymot_only_txtmode
Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_ymot_only_txtmode : ; // u2: 0, min(txt0,txt2); 1, max(txt0,txt2);2, (txt0+txt2)/2; 3: sat(txt0, txt2)

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_cmot_only_txtmode

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_cmot_only_txtthrd

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_cmot_only_motthrd

Control.name: reg_MATNR_SNR_SAD_coring
Control.desc: reg_MATNR_SNR_SAD_coring : Coring value of the intra-frame SAD. sum = (sum - reg_MATNR_SNR_SAD_coring);sum = (sum less than 0) ? 0: (sum>255)? 255: sum;

Control.name: reg_MATNR_SNR_SAD_WinMod

Control.desc: reg_MACFR_frm_phase : U2 This will be a field based phase register that need to be set by FW phase to phase: this will be calculated based on dbdr_phase of the specific line of this frame. u1 : dbdr_phase=1, center line is DB in current line; dbdr_phase=2, center line is Dr in current line;

Control.name: reg_CFR_Motion_Luma_mode
Control.desc: reg_CFR_Motion_Luma_mode : U2 LumaMotion Calculation mode for MA-CFR. 0: top/bot Lumma motion; 1: middle Luma Motion 2: top/bot + middle motion; 3: max(top/tot motion, middle motion)

Control.name: reg_CFR_alpha_gain
Control.desc: reg_CFR_alpha_gain : gain to map muxed curAlp and motAlp to alpha that will be used for final blending.

Control.name: reg_CFR_Motion_ofst
Control.desc: reg_CFR_Motion_ofst : Offset to Motion to calculate the motAlp, e,g:motAlp= reg_CFR_Motion_ofst- Motion;This register can be seen as the level of motion that we consider it at moving.

Control.desc: reg_CFR_CurDif_gain : gain to CurDif to map to alpha, normalized to 32;

Control.name: reg_nr4_mcnr_en
Control.desc: reg_nr4_mcnr_en : // unsigned , default = 1 ncnr enable or bypass, dft = 1

Control.name: reg_nr2_en
Control.desc: reg_nr2_en : // unsigned , default = 1 nr2 enable, dft = 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_en
Control.desc: reg_nr4_en : // unsigned , default = 1 nr4 enable, dft = 1

Control.name: reg_nr2_proc_en
Control.desc: reg_nr2_proc_en : // unsigned , default = 1

Control.name: reg_det3d_en
Control.desc: reg_det3d_en : // unsigned , default = 1

Control.name: di_polar_en
Control.desc: di_polar_en : // unsigned , default = 1 do does not have in C

Control.name: reg_nr4_lnbuf_ctrl
Control.desc: reg_nr4_lnbuf_ctrl : // unsigned , default = 1 line buf ctrl for nr4: 0, 3lines, 1, 5lines, dft = 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_en
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_en : // unsigned , default = 0 snr2 enable, 0: use old snr, 1: use new snr2, dft = 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_scene_change_en
Control.desc: reg_nr4_scene_change_en : // unsigned , default = 1 enable scene change proc. dft = 1

Control.name: nr2_sw_en
Control.desc: nr2_sw_en : // unsigned , default = 1 do does not have in C

Control.name: reg_nr4_scene_change_flg
Control.desc: reg_nr4_scene_change_flg : // unsigned , default = 0 flags for scene change, dft = 0

Control.name: reg_nr4_ydrt_3line_ssd_gain
Control.desc: reg_nr4_ydrt_3line_ssd_gain : // unsigned , default = 16 gain to max ssd normalized 16 as 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_ydrt_5line_ssd_gain
Control.desc: reg_nr4_ydrt_5line_ssd_gain : // unsigned , default = 16 gain to max ssd normalized 16 as 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_drt_yhsad_mode
Control.desc: reg_nr4_drt_yhsad_mode : // unsigned , default = 1 mode for luma horiztonal sad calc., 0: no vertical lpf, 1: vertical [1 2 1], 2 or 3: vertical [ 1 2 2 2 1] if 5 lines

Control.name: reg_nr4_drt_chsad_mode
Control.desc: reg_nr4_drt_chsad_mode : // unsigned , default = 1 mode for chroma horiztonal sad calc., 0: no vertical lpf, 1: vertical [1 2 1], 2 or 3: vertical [ 1 2 2 2 1] if 5 lines

Control.name: reg_nr4_drt_yhsad_hlpf
Control.desc: reg_nr4_drt_yhsad_hlpf : // unsigned , default = 1 hlpf for luma hsad of drt calculation, 0: no lpf, 1: with [1 2 1] hlpf

Control.name: reg_nr4_drt_yvsad_hlpf
Control.desc: reg_nr4_drt_yvsad_hlpf : // unsigned , default = 1 hlpf for luma vsad of drt calculation, 0: no lpf, 1: with [1 2 1] hlpf

Control.name: reg_nr4_drt_ydsad_hlpf
Control.desc: reg_nr4_drt_ydsad_hlpf : // unsigned , default = 1 hlpf for luma dsad of drt calculation, 0: no lpf, 1: with [1 2 1] hlpf

Control.name: reg_nr4_drt_chsad_hlpf
Control.desc: reg_nr4_drt_chsad_hlpf : // unsigned , default = 1 hlpf for chrome hsad of drt calculation, 0: no lpf, 1: with [1 2 1] hlpf

Control.name: reg_nr4_drt_cvsad_hlpf
Control.desc: reg_nr4_drt_cvsad_hlpf : // unsigned , default = 1 hlpf for chroma vsad of drt calculation, 0: no lpf, 1: with [1 2 1] hlpf

Control.name: reg_nr4_drt_cdsad_hlpf
Control.desc: reg_nr4_drt_cdsad_hlpf : // unsigned , default = 1 hlpf for chroma dsad of drt calculation, 0: no lpf, 1: with [1 2 1] hlpf

Control.name: reg_nr4_ydrt_dif_mode
Control.desc: reg_nr4_ydrt_dif_mode : // unsigned , default = 1 0:y_dif, 1: y_dif + (u_dif + v_dif)/2

Control.name: reg_nr4_cdrt_dif_mode
Control.desc: reg_nr4_cdrt_dif_mode : // unsigned , default = 2 0:(u_dif + v_dif), 1: y_dif/4 + (u_dif + v_dif)*3/4, 2:y_dif/2 + (u_dif + v_dif)/2, 3: y_dif (not recommended)

Control.name: reg_nr4_ysad_hrz_gain
Control.desc: reg_nr4_ysad_hrz_gain : // unsigned , default = 16 gain for horizontal sad, 16 normalized to 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_ysad_diag_gain
Control.desc: reg_nr4_ysad_diag_gain : // unsigned , default = 20 gain for diagonal sad, 16 normalized to 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_ysad_vrt_gain
Control.desc: reg_nr4_ysad_vrt_gain : // unsigned , default = 16 gain for vertical sad, 16 normalized to 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_drt_ysad_core_rate
Control.desc: reg_nr4_drt_ysad_core_rate : // unsigned , default = 6 rate of coring for sad(theta) - sad(theta+pi/2)*rate/64

Control.name: reg_nr4_csad_hrz_gain
Control.desc: reg_nr4_csad_hrz_gain : // unsigned , default = 16 gain for horizontal sad, 16 normalized to 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_csad_diag_gain
Control.desc: reg_nr4_csad_diag_gain : // unsigned , default = 20 gain for diagonal sad, 16 normalized to 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_csad_vrt_gain
Control.desc: reg_nr4_csad_vrt_gain : // unsigned , default = 16 gain for vertical sad, 16 normalized to 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_drt_csad_core_rate
Control.desc: reg_nr4_drt_csad_core_rate : // unsigned , default = 6 rate of coring for sad(theta) - sad(theta+pi/2)*rate/64

Control.name: reg_nr4_ydrt_alp_core_rate
Control.desc: reg_nr4_ydrt_alp_core_rate : // unsigned , default = 0 luma ratio to min_err, alpha = (min_err - (max_err - min_err)*rate + ofst)/max_err * 64; dft = 0/32

Control.name: reg_nr4_cdrt_alp_core_rate
Control.desc: reg_nr4_cdrt_alp_core_rate : // unsigned , default = 0 chroma ratio to min_err, alpha = (min_err - (max_err - min_err)*rate + ofst)/max_err * 64; dft = 0/32

Control.name: reg_nr4_ydrt_alp_core_ofst
Control.desc: reg_nr4_ydrt_alp_core_ofst : // unsigned , default = 10 luma offset to min_err, alpha = (min_err - (max_err - min_err)*rate + ofst)/max_err * 64; dft = 10

Control.name: reg_nr4_cdrt_alp_core_ofst
Control.desc: reg_nr4_cdrt_alp_core_ofst : // unsigned , default = 10 chroma offset to min_err, alpha = (min_err - (max_err - min_err)*rate + ofst)/max_err * 64; dft = 10

Control.name: reg_nr4_ydrt_alp_min
Control.desc: reg_nr4_ydrt_alp_min : // unsigned , default = 0 luma min value of alpha, dft = 0

Control.name: reg_nr4_ydrt_alp_max
Control.desc: reg_nr4_ydrt_alp_max : // unsigned , default = 63 luma max value of alpha, dft = 63

Control.name: reg_nr4_cdrt_alp_min
Control.desc: reg_nr4_cdrt_alp_min : // unsigned , default = 0 chroma min value of alpha, dft = 0

Control.name: reg_nr4_cdrt_alp_max
Control.desc: reg_nr4_cdrt_alp_max : // unsigned , default = 63 chroma max value of alpha, dft = 63

Control.name: reg_nr4_bet2_sel
Control.desc: reg_nr4_bet2_sel : // unsigned , default = 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_sel_mode
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_sel_mode : // unsigned , default = 0 0: no filter, 1: adpgau, adp_drt_lpf blend; 2: adpgau, drt4_lpf blend; 3: adp_drt_lpf method, 4: drt4_lpf method, 5: adp_drt_original image blend, 6: drt4_lpf, original image blend, 7: adpgau method; dft=1

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_gaulpf_mode
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_gaulpf_mode : // unsigned , default = 1 0: 3*5 or 5*5 gaussian lpf; 1: 3*3 (window size) gaussian lpf; dft=1

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alpha0_sad_mode
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alpha0_sad_mode : // unsigned , default = 3 0: max_sad*max_ssd; 1: max_sad*max_sad; 2: adp_max_sad*max_ssd; 3: adp_max_sad*adp_max_sad dft=3

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alpha1_sad_mode
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alpha1_sad_mode : // unsigned , default = 2 0: max_sad; 1: cross_max_sad; 2 or 3: adp_sad dft=2

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_adp_drtlpf_mode
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_adp_drtlpf_mode : // unsigned , default = 3 0: adp_drtlpf [2 1 1]/4, 1: adp_drtlpf [4 2 1 1]/8; 2: adp_drtlpf [2 2 2 1 1]/8; 3: adp_drtlpf [7 7 7 6 5]/32; dft=3;

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_ymin
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_ymin : // unsigned , default = 127 normalized to 128 as 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_ymax
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_ymax : // unsigned , default = 127 normalized to 128 as 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_cmin
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_cmin : // unsigned , default = 127 normalized to 128 as 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_cmax
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_cmax : // unsigned , default = 127 normalized to 128 as 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar0
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar0 : // unsigned , default = 0 threshold0 of curve to map mierr to alp0 for chroma channel, this will be set value of flat region mierr that no need blur.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar1
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar1 : // unsigned , default = 25 threshold1 of curve to map mierr to alp0 for chroma channel,this will be set value of texture region mierr that can not blur.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar5
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar5 : // unsigned , default = 40 rate0 (for mierr less than th0) of curve to map mierr to alp0 for chroma channel. the larger of the value, the deep of the slope. 0~255.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar6
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar6 : // unsigned , default = 40 rate1 (for mierr>th1) of curve to map mierr to alp0 for chroma channel. the larger of the value, the deep of the slope. 0~255.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar2
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar2 : // unsigned , default = 127 level limit(for mierr less than th0) of curve to map mierr to alp0 for chroma channel, that we can do for flat region. 0~255.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar3
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar3 : // unsigned , default = 0 level limit(for th0 less than mierr less than th1) of curve to map mierr to alp0 for chroma channel, that we can do for misc region. 0~255.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar4
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_cpar4 : // unsigned , default = 127 level limit(for mierr>th1) of curve to map mierr to alp0 for chroma channel, that we can do for texture region. 0~255.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar0
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar0 : // unsigned , default = 0 threshold0 of curve to map mierr to alp0 for luma channel, this will be set value of flat region mierr that no need blur. 0~255.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar1
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar1 : // unsigned , default = 25 threshold1 of curve to map mierr to alp0 for luma channel,this will be set value of texture region mierr that can not blur.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar5
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar5 : // unsigned , default = 40 rate0 (for mierr less than th0) of curve to map mierr to alp0 for luma channel. the larger of the value, the deep of the slope. 0~255.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar6
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar6 : // unsigned , default = 40 rate1 (for mierr>th1) of curve to map mierr to alp0 for luma channel. the larger of the value, the deep of the slope. 0~255.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar2
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar2 : // unsigned , default = 127 level limit(for mierr less than th0) of curve to map mierr to alp0 for luma channel, set to alp0 that we can do for flat region. 0~255.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar3
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar3 : // unsigned , default = 0 level limit(for th0 less than mierr less than th1) of curve to map mierr to alp0 for luma channel, alp0 that we can do for misc region. 0~255.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar4
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp0_minerr_ypar4 : // unsigned , default = 127 level limit(for mierr>th1) of curve to map mierr to alp0 for luma channel, alp0 that we can do for texture region. 0~255.

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp1_ycore_rate
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp1_ycore_rate : // unsigned , default = 0 normalized 64 as 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp1_ccore_rate
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp1_ccore_rate : // unsigned , default = 0 normalized 64 as 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp1_ycore_ofst
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp1_ycore_ofst : // signed , default = 3 normalized 64 as 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp1_ccore_ofst
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp1_ccore_ofst : // signed , default = 3 normalized 64 as 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp1_ymin
Control.desc: reg_nr4_snr2_alp1_ymin : // unsigned , default = 0 normalized to 64 as 1

Control.name: reg_nr4_snr2_alp1_ymax

Control.name: Cfr_enable
Control.desc: Cfr_enable :

Control.name: reg_CFR_CurDif_luma_mode
Control.desc: reg_CFR_CurDif_luma_mode : Current Field Top/Bot line Luma difference calculation mode

Control.name: reg_MACFR_frm_phase
Control.desc: reg_MACFR_frm_phase : U2 This will be a field based phase register that need to be set by FW phase to phase: this will be calculated based on dbdr_phase of the specific line of this frame. u1 : dbdr_phase=1, center line is DB in current line; dbdr_phase=2, center line is Dr in current line;

Control.name: reg_CFR_CurDif_tran_mode
Control.desc: reg_CFR_CurDif_tran_mode : U2 Current Field Top/Bot line Luma/Chroma transition level calculation mode,

Control.name: reg_CFR_alpha_mode
Control.desc: reg_CFR_alpha_mode : U2 Alpha selection mode for CFR block from curAlp and motAlp i.e. 0: motAlp; 1: (motAlp+curAlp)/2; 2: min(motAlp,curAlp); 3: max(motAlp,curAlp);

Control.name: reg_CFR_Motion_Luma_mode
Control.desc: reg_CFR_Motion_Luma_mode : U2 LumaMotion Calculation mode for MA-CFR. 0: top/bot Lumma motion; 1: middle Luma Motion 2: top/bot + middle motion; 3: max(top/tot motion, middle motion)

Control.name: reg_CFR_alpha_gain
Control.desc: reg_CFR_alpha_gain : gain to map muxed curAlp and motAlp to alpha that will be used for final blending.

Control.name: reg_CFR_Motion_ofst
Control.desc: reg_CFR_Motion_ofst : Offset to Motion to calculate the motAlp, e,g:motAlp= reg_CFR_Motion_ofst- Motion;This register can be seen as the level of motion that we consider it at moving.

Control.name: reg_CFR_CurDif_gain
Control.desc: reg_CFR_CurDif_gain : gain to CurDif to map to alpha, normalized to 32;

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_suremot_txt_mode
Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_suremot_txt_mode : ; // u3: 0: cur, 1:p2; 2: (cur+p2)/2; 3/up: min(cur,p2)

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_coop_mode
Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_coop_mode : ; // u2 0 original pixel 1: [1 2 1]/4 lpf; 2: [1 2 2 2 1]/8; 3: 3x3 lpf

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_coop_ratio
Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_coop_ratio : ; // u4 cur and p2 color oop decision ratio: (avg1 less than (MAX(sat0,sat2)*ratio/8 + ofst));

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_coop_ofset
Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_coop_ofset : ; // s8 cur and p2 color oop decision ofst: (avg1 less than (MAX(sat0,sat2)*ratio/8 + ofst));

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_coop_sat_thrd
Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_coop_sat_thrd : ; // u8 cur and p2 color oop decision min(sat0,sat1) threshold;

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_cnoop_ratio0
Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_cnoop_ratio0 : ; // u4 cur and p2 color noop decision ratio0: (avg1 less than (MAX(sat0,sat2)*ratio0/8 + ofst0));

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_cnoop_ratio1
Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_cnoop_ratio1 : ; // u4

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_cnoop_ofset0
Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_cnoop_ofset0 : ; // s8

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_cnoop_ofset1
Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_cnoop_ofset1 : ; // s8 cur and p2 color noop decision ofset1: (dif1 less than (MIN(sat0,sat2)*ratio1/8 + ofst1));

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_ymot_only_en
Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_ymot_only_en : ; // u1: enable signal for ignor chroma motion: (ytxt @coop)

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_ymot_only_cmtmode
Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_ymot_only_cmtmode : ; // u1: 0: cmot=ymot; 1: cmot = MIN(ymot, cmot)

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_ymot_only_txtmode
Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_ymot_only_txtmode : ; // u2: 0, min(txt0,txt2); 1, max(txt0,txt2);2, (txt0+txt2)/2; 3: sat(txt0, txt2)

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_ymot_only_txtthrd

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_ymot_only_motthrd
Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_ymot_only_motthrd : ; // u8: threshold to luma motion to decide use ymot only

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_cmot_only_en
Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_cmot_only_en : ; // u1: enable signal for ignor luma motion: (ctxt @cnoop)

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_cmot_only_ymtmode
Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_cmot_only_ymtmode : ; // u1: 0: ymot=cmot+ymot/4; 1: ymot = MIN(ymot, cmot)

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_cmot_only_txtmode
Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_cmot_only_txtmode : ; // u2: 0, min(txt0,txt2); 1, max(txt0,txt2);2, (txt0+txt2)/2; 3: sat(txt0, txt2)

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_cmot_only_txtthrd

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_cmot_only_motthrd
Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_cmot_only_motthrd : ; // u8: threshold to chroma motion to decide use cmot only

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_suremot_dec_yrate
Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_suremot_dec_yrate : ; // u8: (norm 16)lpfMot>(dec_rate*txt +ofst) then force lpfMot*frc_gain+frc_ofset

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_suremot_dec_yofst

Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_suremot_frc_ygain : ; // u8: (norm 8)lpfMot>(dec_rate*txt +ofst) then force lpfMot*frc_gain+frc_ofset

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_suremot_frc_yofst
Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_suremot_frc_yofst : ; // u8: lpfMot>(dec_rate*txt +ofst) then force lpfMot*frc_gain+frc_ofset

Control.name: reg_3dnr_nr3_suremot_frc_cgain

Control.name: reg_MATNR_Umtn_use_mode

Control.desc: reg_MATNR_mtn_hp_Ygain : Gain to MotHPF_yuv[k] Luma channel for motion calculation, normalized to 64 as 1

Control.name: reg_MATNR_SNRLPF_Cmode
Control.desc: reg_MATNR_SNRLPF_Cmode : LPF based SNR filtering mode on CHRM channel: 0 : gradient LPF [1 1]/2, 1: gradient LPF [2 1 1]/4; 2: gradient LPF [3 3 2]/8; 3: gradient LPF [5 4 4 3]/16; 4 : TNRLPF; 5 : CurLPF3x3_yuv[]; 6: CurLPF3o3_yuv[] 7: CurLPF3x5_yuv[]

Control.name: reg_MATNR_SNRLPF_Ymode
Control.desc: reg_MATNR_SNRLPF_Ymode : LPF based SNR filtering mode on LUMA channel: 0 : gradient LPF //Bit [1 1]/2, 1: gradient LPF [2 1 1]/4; 2: gradient LPF [3 3 2]/8;3: gradient LPF [5 4 4 3]/16; 4 : TNRLPF; 5 : CurLPF3x3_yuv[]; 6: CurLPF3o3_yuv[] 7: CurLPF3x5_yuv[]

Control.name: reg_MATNR_SNR_SAD_CenRPL
Control.desc: reg_MATNR_SNR_SAD_CenRPL : U1, Enable signal for Current pixel position SAD to be replaced by SAD_min.0: do not replace Current pixel position SAD by SAD_min;1: do replacements

Control.name: reg_MATNR_SNR_SAD_coring
Control.desc: reg_MATNR_SNR_SAD_coring : Coring value of the intra-frame SAD. sum = (sum - reg_MATNR_SNR_SAD_coring);sum = (sum less than 0) ? 0: (sum>255)? 255: sum;

Control.name: reg_MATNR_SNR_SAD_WinMod
Control.desc: reg_MATNR_SNR_SAD_WinMod : Unsigned, Intra-frame SAD matching window mode:0: 1x1; 1: [1 1 1] 2: [1 2 1]; 3: [1 2 2 2 1];

Control.name: Sad_coef_num
Control.desc: Sad_coef_num : Sad coeffient

Control.name: reg_MATNR_SNRLPF_SADmaxTH
Control.desc: reg_MATNR_SNRLPF_SADmaxTH : U8, Threshold to SADmax to use TNRLPF to replace SNRLPF. i.e.if (SAD_max less than reg_MATNR_SNRLPF_SADmaxTH) SNRLPF_yuv[k] = TNRLPF_yuv[k];

Control.name: reg_MATNR_SNRLPF_SADmin3TH

Control.name: reg_MATNR_SNRLPF_SADmin2TH
Control.desc: reg_MATNR_SNRLPF_SADmin2TH : Offset threshold to SAD_min to Discard SAD_min2 corresponding pixel in LPF SNR filtering. (X8 to u8 scale)

Control.desc: reg_CFR_CurDif_luma_mode : Current Field Top/Bot line Luma difference calculation mode

Control.name: reg_MACFR_frm_phase
Control.desc: reg_MACFR_frm_phase : U2 This will be a field based phase register that need to be set by FW phase to phase: this will be calculated based on dbdr_phase of the specific line of this frame. u1 : dbdr_phase=1, center line is DB in current line; dbdr_phase=2, center line is Dr in current line;

Control.name: reg_CFR_CurDif_tran_mode
Control.desc: reg_CFR_CurDif_tran_mode : U2 Current Field Top/Bot line Luma/Chroma transition level calculation mode,

Control.name: reg_CFR_alpha_mode
Control.desc: reg_CFR_alpha_mode : U2 Alpha selection mode for CFR block from curAlp and motAlp i.e. 0: motAlp; 1: (motAlp+curAlp)/2; 2: min(motAlp,curAlp); 3: max(motAlp,curAlp);

Control.name: reg_CFR_Motion_Luma_mode
Control.desc: reg_CFR_Motion_Luma_mode : U2 LumaMotion Calculation mode for MA-CFR. 0: top/bot Lumma motion; 1: middle Luma Motion 2: top/bot + middle motion; 3: max(top/tot motion, middle motion)

Control.name: reg_CFR_alpha_gain
Control.desc: reg_CFR_alpha_gain : gain to map muxed curAlp and motAlp to alpha that will be used for final blending.

Control.name: reg_CFR_Motion_ofst
Control.desc: reg_CFR_Motion_ofst : Offset to Motion to calculate the motAlp, e,g:motAlp= reg_CFR_Motion_ofst- Motion;This register can be seen as the level of motion that we consider it at moving.

Control.name: reg_CFR_CurDif_gain
Control.desc: reg_CFR_CurDif_gain : gain to CurDif to map to alpha, normalized to 32;

Control.desc: reg_3dnr_nr3_coop_ratio : ; // u4 cur and p2 color oop decision ratio: (avg1 less than (MAX(sat0,sat2)*ratio/8 + ofst));
